languages.text: Совокупность {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходов{/g} персонажей в бою. В начале каждого раунда {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} персонажей восполняются.

The sum of the characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat. At the start of each round, all characters' {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} are restored.
languages.original_text: Совокупность {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходов{/g} персонажей в бою. В начале каждого раунда {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} персонажей восполняются.

traits.locale_text: The sum of the characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat. At the start of each round, all characters' {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} are restored.

languages.text: Die Summe der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Züge{/g} der Charaktere im Kampf. Zu Beginn jeder Runde werden alle {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} der Charaktere wiederhergestellt.

traits.locale_text: Die Summe der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Züge{/g} der Charaktere im Kampf. Zu Beginn jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} werden alle {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} der Charaktere wiederhergestellt.

languages.text: Somme des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g} de combat des personnages. Au début de chaque round, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} des personnages sont rétablis.
languages.original_text: The sum of the characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat. At the start of each round, all characters' {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} are restored.

traits.locale_text: Somme des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g} de combat des personnages. Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} des personnages sont rétablis.

languages.text: 角色在战斗中的回合数。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}每一轮开始时，所有角色的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}行动点数{/g}都会恢复。
languages.original_text: The sum of the characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat. At the start of each round, all characters' {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} are restored.

traits.locale_text: 角色在战斗中的回合数。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时，所有角色的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}行动点数{/g}都会恢复。

languages.original_text: The sum of the characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat. At the start of each round, all characters' {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} are restored.

languages.text: La suma de los {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g} de todos los personajes en el combate. Al comienzo de cada asalto, se restauran los {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} y de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movimiento{/g} de todos los personajes.
languages.original_text: The sum of the characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat. At the start of each round, all characters' {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} are restored.

traits.locale_text: La suma de los {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g} de todos los personajes en el combate. Al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, se restauran los {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} y de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movimiento{/g} de todos los personajes.

languages.text: 戦闘中のキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の合計。各ラウンド開始時に、全てのキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}が回復する。
languages.original_text: The sum of the characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat. At the start of each round, all characters' {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} are restored.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中のキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の合計。各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}開始時に、全てのキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}が回復する。

languages.text: Karakterlerin çatışmadaki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turlarının{/g} toplamı. Her raundun başında, bütün karakterlerin {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanları{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanları{/g} yenilenir.
languages.original_text: The sum of the characters' {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} in combat. At the start of each round, all characters' {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} are restored.
